description: Kirk is the supportive father who enjoys spending time with his family and working on home projects.
Lori is the caring mother who loves cooking, gardening, and making everyone feel at home.
Lacy is the creative sister who enjoys painting, music, and spending time with friends.
Cody is the energetic brother-in-law who loves sports, outdoor adventures, and family gatherings.
Denton is passionate about technology, enjoys coding, and values time with loved ones.
Gracie is a cheerful wife who loves baking, traveling, and making memories with family.
Bryce is an adventurous brother who enjoys gaming, hiking, and learning new things.
Preston is the youngest brother who loves animals, playing outside, and exploring.
